nodes.text: A magic wand was a slender stick or rod thought to have magic properties. It was used by magicians, conjurors and shamans to cast spells. On the forest moon of Endor, several Forceful beings were known to use such rods. The Ewok Logray, head shaman of the Bright Tree Village, possessed a magic staff, a healing wand, a spirit staff—that helped summon dead ancestors for asistance—and a ceremonial wand. The mysterious enchantress known as the Leaf Queen also held a shaft of wood that allowed her to perform various magical acts.
Luke Skywalker once thought wistfully that there was no magic wand that could make everything better, not even for a Jedi.
